Enclosing class:
HelpDocs
public class HelpDocs.HelpBackAndForward
extends java.lang.Object

Class: HelpBackAndForward. Used for moving to the previous and the next pages in the help file.

Theory of operation: The current record matches the one currently being displayed.

Title: Sam

Description: ALP Business Process User Interface

Copyright: Copyright (c) Doug MacKenzie

Company: Mobile Intelligence Corp.
